parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Middle - 2nd Person Singular
str2: Probably from phule through the idea of isolation; to watch, i.e. Be on guard; by implication, to preserve, obey, avoid.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Accusative Masculine Singular

str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To set against; I withstand, resist, oppose. From anti and histemi; to stand against, i.e. Oppose.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 1st Person Plural
str2: Our, our own. From thnetos; our.
From lego; something said; by implication, a topic, also reasoning or motive; by extension, a computation; specially, the Divine Expression.
